actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security

official_title: To codify an Executive order securing the United States bulk-power system.
short_title: Stopping Chinese Communist Involvement in the Power Grid Act
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
Stopping Chinese Communist Involvement in the Power Grid Act

This bill provides statutory authority for Executive Order 13920, which set forth requirements related to securing the U.S. bulk-power system.

titles.title: Stopping Chinese Communist Involvement in the Power Grid Act
